sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app id="inspire">
    <v-navigation-drawer
      v-model="drawer"
      app
      v-if="login"
    >
     <v-list-item>
       <v-list-item-content>
         <v-list-item-title>
           Bliss Life
         </v-list-item-title>
         <v-list-item-subtitle>
           BLOG APP
         </v-list-item-subtitle>
       </v-list-item-content>
     </v-list-item>
     <v-divider></v-divider>
     <v-list dense>
      
      <v-list-item-group
        
        color="primary"
      >
        <v-list-item
          v-for="(item, i) in items"
          :key="i"
          :to="item.link" link
        >
          <v-list-item-icon>
            <v-icon v-text="item.icon"></v-icon>
          </v-list-item-icon>
          <v-list-item-content>
            <v-list-item-title v-text="item.title"></v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item-content>
        </v-list-item>
      </v-list-item-group>
    </v-list>
    </v-navigation-drawer>

    <v-app-bar app  v-if="login">
      <v-app-bar-nav-icon @click="drawer = !drawer"></v-app-bar-nav-icon>

      <v-toolbar-title>Bliss Life Blogs</v-toolbar-title>
    </v-app-bar>

    <v-main>
      <router-view></router-view>
    </v-main>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    data: () => ({ drawer: null,
     items: [
    //    { title: 'Home', icon: 'mdi-home',link:"/" },
        { title: 'Add Post', icon: 'mdi-note-plus',link:"/add-post" },
        { title: 'About', icon: 'mdi-help-box',link:"/about" },
        { title: 'Profile', icon: 'mdi-account',link:"/profile" },
        
      ],
      login:false
    }),
    

  }
</script>
